column1: The case was supported by seeking leave to appeal from the order dated 23.03.2021 in case No.
Appeal 31/2019 of the Provincial High Court of the Western Province Holden at Homagama. Case
NO.71129/16 was filed by Sri Lanka Foreign Employment Bureau (who will be referred to as the
"Respondent" in this application) against the Accused Appellant Petitioner (who will be referred
to as the "Petitioner" in this application) for violating Section 44 and Section 65 of the Foreign
